title: Ritz Carlton Battery Park
text: This man made extension of the lower part of SE Manhattan is home to the Battery Park Ritz Carlton. Clean, and easy to get to, this property does have some nice views of the river and Statue of Liberty. This hotel means business, so don't expect over the top luxury (luscious spa, steam room or brand new rooms) but if you need a good hotel in this area it isn't all that bad.
